original_text: Then a person who is clean must take hyssop. He must put it into the water. Then he must use it to splash the water on the tent and on everything that is in it. He must also splash the water on all the people who have been there. And he must splash it on the person who touched the bone or the dead body or the grave.
korean_text: 정결한 자가 우슬초를 가져다가 그 물을 찍어 장막과 그 모든 기구와 거기 있는 사람들에게 뿌리고 또 뼈나 죽임을 당한 자나 시체나 무덤을 만진 자에게 뿌리되

sentences.original_text: Then a person who is clean
He must put it into the water.
Then he must use it to splash the water
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 다음 그는 그것을 사용하여 물을 뿌려야 합니다

sentences.original_text: and on everything that is in it.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 안에 있는 모든 것에.

sentences.original_text: He must also splash the water
on all the people who have been there.
on the person who touched the bone
